item.title: i-Invested
item.description:
i-Invested

i-Invested Global open source ecosystem...where ideas come to life. Vision Our vision is to bring ideas to life by empowering innovative crowds. Mission Connecting the dots between ideas, individuals and investors is our passion and long term mission. Revolutionising, democratising and socialising the future of finance one idea at time.

item.title: San Francisco "High Tide"
item.description:
San Francisco "High Tide"

Born of sea and fog, San Francisco fills with charm when the tides come in. Scenes include Golden Gate Bridge, Bay Bridge, Twin Peaks, Cliffhouse, Mission, Fisherman's Wharf, Palace of Fine Arts, Six Sisters, Union Square, Baker Beach, Treasure Island, Market St, Embarcadero, and Land's End. Music by Stephen Anderson.

item.title: The Brexit Impact on Fintech
item.description:
The Brexit Impact on Fintech

In terms of Brexit news in general, personally I was shocked of the results. I did not expect the majority of the UK to vote "Leave". We are living in a globalised society where social connectivity does not recognise any borders and is fair to say that "business" is operating in this space too, with UK and EU at the centre of the global trade.
